title: Android 12 and the M1 iMac!
description:
This week, we take a deep dive into the many announcements from Google I/O, before we welcome David Imel to the episode, who brings us an interview with Liam Spradlin, a designer with Google and someone who worked on Material You. Finally, we discuss the M1 Apple lineup and the new specs from the all-electric Ford F-150 Lightning.
